name: World Congress on Quantum Physics
content: The organizer of the QUNTUM PHYSICS 2022 invites all participants from all over the world to join the famous scientific International Conference on "Quantum Physics," which will take place in Amsterdam, Netherlands on May 23-24, 2022\. It is one of the world's most prestigious scientific conferences, hosting scientific sessions and sub-sessions on cutting-edge research and the most recent innovations in the fields of quantum physics and quantum technology from all over the world. Attendees will get access to certain unique workshops and panel discussions on the most recent developments in physics. Theme: Emphasizing Novel Researches and Frontline Advances of Quantum Physics.
